entry.title: Fix No Sound Issue On Mac
entry.content:
Now I am dealing with Mac OSX. However I found sometimes this is no sound. People say it’s a bug. I have tried some methods. And found this goes for me every time. ```bash

!/bin/bash

sudo kextunload /System/Library/Extensions/AppleHDA.kext sudo kextload /System/Library/Extensions/AppleHDA.kext ``` Put the code into a shell script and run the script whenever the issue occurs.
